pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | ComfortZone Hotel - Your Data Privacy and Protection ☰ Home Events Games Booking Privacy Policy Welcome to ComfortZone! We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, comfortzone.com. Information We Collect We may collect and process the following types of information: Personal Identification Information: Name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide when making a reservation or contacting us. Payment Information: Credit card details, billing address, and other payment-related information. Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, and other details related to your visit to our website. Usage Data: Information on how you use our website, including pages viewed, time spent on the site, and navigation patterns. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: To process and manage your reservations and bookings. To improve our website and customer service. To send you confirmation emails, updates, and promotional offers (with your consent). To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights. How We Share Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as described below: Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your information is stored on secure servers and is protected by industry-standard encryption technologies. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at comfortzone@gmail.com. Cookies We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our site. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: comfortzone@gmail.com Thank you for choosing ComfortZone! Address 4-1-999, Abids Road, Sultan Bazar, Abids, Hyderabad, Telangana 500001, India Email comfortzone@gmail.com Phone +91-234-123432 Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | ComfortZone Hotel - Policies and Regulations ☰ Home Events Games Booking Terms and Conditions Welcome to ComfortZone! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of ComfortZone's website, located at comfortzone.com. Acceptance of Terms By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use ComfortZone if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. Bookings and Reservations All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Prices and availability of rooms are subject to change without notice. By making a booking, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. ComfortZone reserves the right to cancel or modify reservations where it appears that a customer has engaged in fraudulent or inappropriate activity or under other circumstances where it appears that the reservations contain or resulted from a mistake or error. Payment All payments must be made in full at the time of booking unless otherwise stated. We accept major credit cards and other forms of payment as indicated on our website. In case of any issues with payment, ComfortZone reserves the right to cancel the reservation. Cancellation and Refunds Cancellation policies vary depending on the room type and rate plan selected. Please refer to the specific terms provided at the time of booking. Refunds will be processed according to our cancellation policy and may take several business days to appear on your account. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time is from 2:00 PM and check-out time is by 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Use of Our Website You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website. You must not use this website to transmit or send unsolicited commercial communications. You must not use this website for any purposes related to marketing without our express written consent. Intellectual Property Unless otherwise stated, ComfortZone and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on ComfortZone. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from ComfortZone for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. Limitation of Liability ComfortZone will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature, including but not limited to indirect or consequential loss or damage, arising from or in connection with the use of this website or the services provided. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which ComfortZone operates. You irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location. Changes to These Terms ComfortZone reserves the right to revise these terms and conditions at any time. By using this website, you are expected to review these terms on a regular basis. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at: Email: comfortzone@gmail.com Thank you for choosing ComfortZone! Address 4-1-999, Abids Road, Sultan Bazar, Abids, Hyderabad, Telangana 500001, India Email comfortzone@gmail.com Phone +91-234-123432 Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer
pages.thanks: Thank You | ComfortZone Hotel - We Appreciate Your Visit body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f4f4f4; text-align: center; padding: 50px; } h1 { color: #333; } p { color: #666; font-size: 18px; } .back { max-width: 300px; background-color: #219ebc; margin: auto; align-items: center; text-align: center; padding: 10px; transition: 0.3s; cursor: pointer; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-decoration: none; } .back:hover { background-color: white; border: 2px solid #219ebc; transition: 0.3s; color: black; transition: 0.3s; } Thank You! Dear Guest, Thank you for visiting ComfortZone! We are delighted that you took the time to explore our website and learn more about our offerings. Your interest and support mean the world to us. Whether you are planning a vacation, a business trip, or a quick getaway, we strive to create an environment that feels like your home away from home. If you have any questions, need further information, or wish to make a reservation, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to assist you and ensure your experience with ComfortZone is nothing short of extraordinary. We look forward to welcoming you soon! Warm regards, The ComfortZone Team Contact Us Email: comfortzone@gmail.com Thank you once again for your visit and interest in ComfortZone. Have a wonderful day! Home
